summary: This report examines U.S. coordination with other countries on military training provided to Ukrainian forces outside Ukraine. This is one of many GAO reports on U.S. aid to Ukraine following Russia's full-scale invasion in February 2022. We found that over 30 countries helped train about 116,000 Ukrainians outside Ukraine as of Feb. 2024. The U.S. trained about 16% of them. As of May, the number...
title: Ukraine: DOD Could Strengthen International Military Training Coordination by Improving Data Quality
